problem_text_en: As shown in Figure 1, if PA = PB, ∠APB = N_0 ∠ACB, AC and PB intersect at point D, and PB = N_1, PD = N_2, then AD•DC is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:延长BP到E使PE=PB=4,连结AE,如图,∵PA=PB,∴PE=PA,∴∠1=∠E,而∠APB=∠1+∠E,∴∠APB=2∠E,∵∠APB=2∠ACB,∴∠E=∠C,而∠ADE=∠CDB,∴△ADE∽△BDC,∴\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{ED}{CD},∴AD•CD=BE=BD•ED=(4+3)•(4-3)=7．故选:C．
